content:
I'm getting the bors migrate message even when I'm on bors.rust-lang.org :)

Maybe not worth fixing, but wanted to let you know.
I had always wondered why it was buildbot2.r-l.o...
there are automatic permanent redirects from the old domains to bors.rust-lang.org
so that banner is the only way to let people know we did the change

Camelid said:

I had always wondered why it was buildbot2.r-l.o...

this was before I joined, but we used buildbot before travis+appveyor
I was thinking of removing the banner in a week or two
I meant maybe we could detect what domain it's hosted on (with JS?). But like I said probably not worth it
@Camelid not really, as it's not possible to be on the buildbot2.rust-lang.org page anymore (you get redirected) -- people would never see the message
Oh, I see what you mean. I saw when you said there are automatic permanent redirects but somehow I didn't connect the dots :laughing:
